DOC.brief_summary: This project implement evaluated Rosalyn Carter Institute 's ( RCI 's ) educational support program caregiver , `` Caring You , Caring Me . '' Specifically , examined effect program upon family caregiver older adult Atlanta area elderly Veterans receive outpatient primary care Atlanta Veterans Affairs Medical Center ( VAMC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Carter Institute Caregiver Education Program VA
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective research : 1. evaluate user satisfaction perceive utility `` Caring You , Caring Me '' caregiver educational program among formal ( VHA staff ) informal ( family ) caregiver undergo program ; 2. assess effect program upon psychosocial physical well-being informal caregiver 1-year period .
DOC.criteria: Family member Veterans age 65+ year receive care Atlanta VAMC 's Clinic Atlanta area . Must primary caregiver someone 55 . Must assist least one activity daily living ( ADL ) least 6 month prior begin intervention . Caregivers automatically exclude veteran terminal illness six month less live .
